casebody.data:
No. 09-8373. Kareem Smith, Petitioner v. David Napoli, Superintendent, Southport Correctional Facility. 559 U.S. 981, 130 S. Ct. 1708,

176 L. Ed. 2d 195,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 2031. March 1, 2010.

Petition for writ of cer-tiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Second Circuit denied.

Same case below, 347 Fed. Appx. 695.
